languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, не о том печалитесь. Я на этом корабле без малого десять лет. Держала бы меня госпожа фон Валанциус, если бы не была уверена во мне?" {n}Идира мнется пару мгновений.{/n} "Да, бывает иногда... по мелочи. Когда слышу всякое. Порой даже так хорошо слышу, что оно становится взаправдашним. Но и у обычных людей бывают плохие дни, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, не о том печалитесь. Я на этом корабле без малого десять лет. Держала бы меня госпожа фон Валанциус, если бы не была уверена во мне?" {n}Идира мнется пару мгновений.{/n} "Да, бывает иногда... по мелочи. Когда слышу всякое. Порой даже так хорошо слышу, что оно становится взаправдашним. Но и у обычных людей бывают плохие дни, верно?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, не о том печалитесь. Я на этом корабле без малого десять лет. Порой даже так хорошо слышу, что оно становится взаправдашним. Но и у обычных людей бывают плохие дни, верно?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，这件事情没什么好担心的。我在这艘船上呆了快有十年了，如果冯·瓦兰修斯夫人对我不放心，那她会让我留下来吗？”{n}伊迪拉犹豫了一会儿。{/n}“我是说，呃，有的时候确实会发生一些小事情……很小的事情。比如说，我会听到声音。有的时候那些声音太清晰了，我会信以为真。但就算是普通人，也有不在状态的时候，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这件事情没什么好担心的。我在这艘船上呆了快有十年了，如果冯·瓦兰修斯夫人对我不放心，那她会让我留下来吗？”{n}伊迪拉犹豫了一会儿。{/n}“我是说，呃，有的时候确实会发生一些小事情……很小的事情。比如说，我会听到声音。有的时候那些声音太清晰了，我会信以为真。但就算是普通人，也有不在状态的时候，没错吧？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, no tiene de qué preocuparse. Llevo casi diez años en esta nave. ¿Me habría mantenido aquí lady von Valancius si no estuviera segura sobre mi capacidad de control?». {n}Idira titubea por un momento.{/n} «A ver, sí, a veces pasan cosas... pero nada grave. Como cuando oigo cosas. En ocasiones, lo que oigo está tan claro que me parece real. Pero hasta la gente normal tiene días malos, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, no tiene de qué preocuparse. Llevo casi diez años en esta nave. ¿Me habría mantenido aquí lady von Valancius si no estuviera segura sobre mi capacidad de control?». {n}Idira titubea por un momento.{/n} «A ver, sí, a veces pasan cosas... pero nada grave. Como cuando oigo cosas. En ocasiones, lo que oigo está tan claro que me parece real. Pero hasta la gente normal tiene días malos, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、心配することはないわ。あたいはこの船に乗ってまだ10年足らず。あたいを信頼してなかったら、レディ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが雇い続けたと思う？」{n}イディラは一瞬ためらった。{/n}「つまり、ええ、時々いろいろなことが起こるわ…些細なことがね。聞こえてきたことがはっきりとして、それが現実になることもある。でも普通の人にも悪い日はあるものでしょ？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、心配することはないわ。あたいはこの船に乗ってまだ10年足らず。あたいを信頼してなかったら、レディ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが雇い続けたと思う？」{n}イディラは一瞬ためらった。{/n}「つまり、ええ、時々いろいろなことが起こるわ…些細なことがね。聞こえてきたことがはっきりとして、それが現実になることもある。でも普通の人にも悪い日はあるものでしょ？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es gibt keinen Grund zur Sorge. Ich bin seit knapp zehn Jahren auf diesem Schiff. Hätte Lady von Valancius mich bei sich behalten, wenn sie Zweifel an mir gehabt hätte?" {n}Idira stockt kurz.{/n} "Ich meine, ja, manchmal geschehen Dinge ... kleine Dinge. Wenn ich zum Beispiel etwas höre. Manchmal höre ich Dinge so klar, dass sie für mich real werden. Aber auch gewöhnliche Leute haben mal einen schlechten Tag, oder nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es gibt keinen Grund zur Sorge. Ich bin seit knapp zehn Jahren auf diesem Schiff. Hätte Lady von Valancius mich bei sich behalten, wenn sie Zweifel an mir gehabt hätte?" {n}Idira stockt kurz.{/n} "Ich meine, ja, manchmal geschehen Dinge ... kleine Dinge. Wenn ich zum Beispiel etwas höre. Manchmal höre ich Dinge so klar, dass sie für mich real werden. Aber auch gewöhnliche Leute haben mal einen schlechten Tag, oder nicht?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ça va bientôt faire dix ans que je suis sur ce vaisseau. Vous croyez vraiment que dame von Valancius m'aurait gardée à bord si elle ne me faisait pas confiance ? » {n}Elle marque une hésitation.{/n} « Alors oui, il se passe des trucs, des fois... Des petits trucs. J'entends des choses, par exemple. Parfois, c'est si clair que pour moi, ça devient la réalité. Mais bon, même les gens ordinaires ont des jours sans, non ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ça va bientôt faire dix ans que je suis sur ce vaisseau. Vous croyez vraiment que dame von Valancius m'aurait gardée à bord si elle ne me faisait pas confiance ? » {n}Elle marque une hésitation.{/n} « Alors oui, il se passe des trucs, des fois... Des petits trucs. J'entends des choses, par exemple. Parfois, c'est si clair que pour moi, ça devient la réalité. Mais bon, même les gens ordinaires ont des jours sans, non ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, endişelenmene lüzum yok. Bu gemide on yılımı devirdim sayılır. Leydi von Valancius bana güvenmeseydi beni burada barındırır mıydı?" {n}İdira, bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Yani evet, ara sıra bir şeyler oluyor... Ama büyütülecek şeyler değil. Duyduğum sesler mesela. Bazen öyle berrak geliyorlar ki gerçek olanlarından ayırt edemiyorum. Gerçi herkesin kötü günü olur, yanlış mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's nothing to worry about. I've been on this ship just short of ten years. Would Lady von Valancius have kept me on if she wasn't sure about me?" {n}Idira falters for a moment.{/n} "I mean, yeah, sometimes stuff happens... small stuff. Like when I hear things. Sometimes what I hear is so clear it becomes real to me. But even ordinary folks have bad days, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, endişelenmene lüzum yok. Neredeyse on yıldır bu gemideyim. Bana güvenmeseydi Leydi von Valancius beni bu gemide tutar mıydı?" {n}İdira, bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Yani evet, bazen bir şeyler oluyor. Önemsiz şeyler... Duyduğum sesler gibi mesela. Bazen o kadar yakından geliyorlar ki benim için tek gerçek onlar oluyor. Sonuçta herkesin kötü günleri olur, yanlış mıyım?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
